feed.title: OneUptime Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3188
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- [Snyk] Security upgrade express from 4.19.2 to 4.21.1 - PR: #1731 - [Snyk] Security upgrade express from 4.19.2 to 4.20.0 - PR: #1703 - [Snyk] Security upgrade node from 22.5 to 22.8 - PR: #1707 - [Snyk] Security upgrade node from 22.5 to 22.9 - PR: #1701 - [OneUptime Copilot] Improve Comments on /App/Index.ts - PR: #1618
</details>

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3198
entry.content: No significant changes were made. We have just fixed minor bugs for this release. You can find the detailed information in the commit history.

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3200
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- refactor: change tailwind.js from cdn to serve local - PR: #1736 - [Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities - PR: #1732 - Improved comments on /App/FeatureSet/Identity/API/StatusPageSSO.ts - PR: #1734
</details>

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3206
